DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind study . Patients randomly assign oral 3,4-diaminopyridine ( 3,4-DAP ) placebo administer 4 day . After washout least 5 day , patient cross alternate therapy 4 day .
